summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein, detailing shipping charges and services provided. It includes multiple entries for shipments made by Epstein, with various charges, discounts, and delivery details.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated August 22, 2005, and details shipping charges totaling $531.11.
Jeffrey E. Epstein is the primary account holder for the FedEx account.
Multiple shipments were sent and received by Epstein, with various recipients including Christopher Gale and Larry Visoski.
The document includes detailed breakdowns of transportation charges, discounts, and special handling fees.
Several shipments were picked up and delivered on specific dates in August 2005.
